title: Automated Test Execution Framework
description: Create an automated testing framework that executes comprehensive test suites to validate application functionality, performance, and reliability for core system components.
iWant: an automated test execution framework that runs comprehensive test suites
soThat: I can ensure application quality and detect defects early in the development cycle
acceptanceCriteria: Framework executes unit, integration, and system tests automatically
Test results display clear pass/fail status with execution summaries
Failed tests provide detailed error logs and stack traces
Complete test suite execution finishes within 12 minutes
